mapper.insert: insert into food_boards( member_no, photo, content, modified_date ) values( #{memberNo}, #{photoFilePath}, #{content}, now() )
mapper.select: select food_board_no, member_no, photo, content, DATE_FORMAT(modified_date, "%Y년 %m월 %d일 %p %h:%i") as modified_date from food_boards where member_no=#{memberNo} order by food_board_no asc
